Serialized Form

  • Package filemanager

    • Class filemanager.DataContainer extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • courseList
          java.util.ArrayList<Course> courseList
          ArrayList to hold Course objects.
        • staffList
          java.util.ArrayList<Staff> staffList
          ArrayList to hold Staff objects.
        • studentList
          java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList
          ArrayList to hold Student objects.

  • Package model

    • Class model.Course extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • AU
          int AU
          The number of Academic Units that is assigned to this course.
        • course_code
          java.lang.String course_code
          The course code that uniquely identifies this course. Must be unique (i.e. no other Course has the same course code as this Course). Must follow the format AB1234: where A and B can be any alphabet (lower case will be converted to uppercase) and 1, 2, 3 and 4 can be any integers 0-9.
        • course_name
          java.lang.String course_name
          The name of this course.
        • indexes
          java.util.ArrayList<Index> indexes
          A list of indexes that belongs to this course.
        • school
          School school
          The school that administers this course. The value of this attribute has to be an element of the School enumeration, which is currently NBS and SCSE.

    • Class model.Index extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • course
          Course course
          The course that this index belongs to.
        • enrolledStudents
          java.util.ArrayList<Student> enrolledStudents
          A list of students that are currently enrolled in this index.
        • index_number
          int index_number
          The index number of this index.
        • lessons
          java.util.HashMap<LessonType,​java.util.ArrayList<TimeSlot>> lessons
          Represents the lessons that are conducted by this index, with each lesson having a LessonType and a TimeSlot.

          Stored in a hashmap data structure that contains the LessonTypes as its keys, with each LessonType key pointing to a list of TimeSlots of that particular LessonType.

        • max_capacity
          int max_capacity
          The maximum number of students that can enrol in this index.
        • waitlistedStudents
          java.util.ArrayList<Student> waitlistedStudents
          A list of students that are currently waitlisted for this index.

    • Class model.Staff extends User implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • staff_number
          java.lang.String staff_number
          Staff number of the staff

    • Class model.Student extends User implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • email
          java.lang.String email
          Email of the student
        • endPeriod
          java.time.LocalDateTime endPeriod
          End of access period of the student
        • matric_number
          java.lang.String matric_number
          Matriculation number of the student
        • matriculation_date
          java.time.LocalDate matriculation_date
          Matriculation date of the student
        • maximumAUs
          int maximumAUs
          Maximum allowable AUs limit of the student
        • registered
          java.util.ArrayList<Index> registered
          ArrayList of registered course Indexes of the student
        • startPeriod
          java.time.LocalDateTime startPeriod
          Start of access period of the student
        • waitlisted
          java.util.ArrayList<Index> waitlisted
          ArrayList of waitlisted course Indexes of the student

    • Class model.TimeSlot extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dayOfWeek
          int dayOfWeek
          The day of the week that the lesson is held on.

          Value of 1 means Monday, 2 means Tuesday, 3 means Wednesday, 4 means Thursday, 5 means Friday, 6 means Saturday, 7 means Sunday.

        • endTime
          java.time.LocalTime endTime
          The end time of the lesson. TimeSlot.endTime cannot be earlier than TimeSlot.startTime. Follows the hh:mm format.
        • location
          java.lang.String location
          The location that the lesson is conducted in.
        • startTime
          java.time.LocalTime startTime
          The start time of the lesson. Follows the hh:mm format.

    • Class model.User extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dob
          java.time.LocalDate dob
          Date of birth of the user
        • fullname
          java.lang.String fullname
          Full name of the user
        • gender
          Gender gender
          Gender of the user
        • nationality
          java.lang.String nationality
          Nationality of the user
        • passwordHash
          byte[] passwordHash
          Password hash of the user
        • username
          java.lang.String username
          Username of the user
